list-item.p: Naja haje venom induced various toxic effects but Moringa oleifera reversed anemia.
Inhibited haemorrhagic, haemolytic and anti-coagulant activities, also, elevated.
Nuclear factor erythroid 2-related factor 2 levels, normalised antioxidant enzyme.
Reduced levels of Tumor Necrosis Factor-α and interleukin-1β and.
Ameliorated histological defects noticed on brain, liver and kidney tissues.
